text: Djohari Kahar (11 November 1931 â€“ 12 September 2021) was an Indonesian politician. He was a member of Golkar. He was a member of the People's Representative Council and the People's Consultative Assembly from 1982 until 1992. Kahar was born in Solok, Indonesia. Kahar died on 12 September 2021 in Padang, Indonesia at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians
title: Djohari Kahar
